image_prompt: A photo-realistic, cinematic wide shot inside a modern, clean manufacturing facility. In the foreground, a diverse group of reliability engineers (a woman and two men) wearing hard hats, safety glasses, and high-visibility vests are gathered around a large industrial motor. One engineer is pointing at a small, wireless orange sensor attached to the motor cooling fin. Another engineer holds a tablet (showing only the back of the device) as if checking data. The background shows blurred conveyor lines and automated machinery with soft, cool industrial lighting. The atmosphere is professional, high-tech, and safety-focused. No text or overlays.
